author: By     MarketWatch
title: Video: Arts, light rail, in-town real estate join baseball’s Royals in Kansas City revival
text:
Kansas City's surprise (2:04) Kansas City, Mo., has more to offer than barbecue. Due to a thriving arts scene and revamped public spaces, it has emerged as a top draw among young professionals. Photo: Ryan Nicholson for the Wall Street Journal
